Class HibernateUtils

java.lang.Object

public class HibernateUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Manages Hibernate package functionality. TODO: need to have hibernate folder with various files in the project's directory --Brian So if we are deriving a project from the Context Toolkit, we'll also need to have a hibernate folder. Best to be able to toggle to disable this, and/or easily set one up and customize it.
